TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ServiceDebugElement extends System.ServiceModel.Configuration.BehaviorExtensionElement
Public NotInheritable Class ServiceDebugElement Inherits BehaviorExtensionElement

summary.span: 表示組態項目，指定 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 服務的偵錯和說明資訊功能。

span.span: Represents a configuration element that specifies debugging and help information features for a Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) service.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您將 屬性以程式設計的方式設定為 `true`，就可以讓 Managed 例外狀況資訊傳送至用戶端以便偵錯，以及發行 HTML 資訊檔案，在 Web 瀏覽器中瀏覽該服務的使用者便可以存取這些檔案。If you set the property to `true` programmatically, you can enable the flow of managed exception information to the client for debugging purposes, as well as the publication of HTML information files for users browsing the service in Web browsers. > [!CAUTION] > 將 Managed 例外狀況資訊傳回至服務可能會有安全性風險。Returning managed exception information to services can be a security risk. 這是因為例外狀況細節會公開內部用戶端實作的相關資訊，可能會被未經授權的服務加以利用。This is because exception details expose information about the internal client implementation that could be used by unauthorized services. 和 屬性會在使用 HTML 瀏覽器檢視服務時，指示服務要發行 HTML 說明檔案。The and properties instruct the service to publish HTML help files when the service is viewed using an HTML browser. 和 屬性會控制所檢視的 HTML 說明頁的位置。The and properties control the location of the HTML help page that is viewed. 如果要使用組態檔啟用或停用其中一項 功能，必須：To enable or disable one of the features using a configuration file, you must: 1. 新增`behaviorConfiguration`屬性設定為[<服務>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/service.md) WCF 服務項目。Add a `behaviorConfiguration` attribute to the [<service>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/service.md) element for your WCF service. (端點行為上設定``項目，而上的服務行為[<服務>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/service.md)項目。)(Endpoint behaviors are configured on `` elements; service behaviors on [<service>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/service.md) elements.) 2. 加入或建立[ <serviceBehaviors> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicebehaviors.md)區段並新增[<行為>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/behavior-of-endpointbehaviors.md)項目名稱符合`behaviorConfiguration`步驟 1 中屬性值。Add to or create a [<serviceBehaviors>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicebehaviors.md) section and add a [<behavior>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/behavior-of-endpointbehaviors.md) element to that with the name that matches the `behaviorConfiguration` attribute value from step 1. (端點行為會設定為使用[ <endpointBehaviors> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/endpointbehaviors.md)項目; 服務行為使用設定[ <serviceBehaviors> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicebehaviors.md)項目。(Endpoint behaviors are configured using an [<endpointBehaviors>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/endpointbehaviors.md) element; service behaviors are configured using a [<serviceBehaviors>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicebehaviors.md) element. 3. 新增[ <serviceDebug> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicedebug.md)項目[<行為>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/behavior-of-endpointbehaviors.md)步驟 2 中的項目，啟用或停用適當的各種屬性您的案例。Add a [<serviceDebug>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicedebug.md) element to the [<behavior>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/behavior-of-endpointbehaviors.md) element from step 2 and enable or disable the various properties appropriate to your scenario. 如需特定範例，請參閱＜範例＞一節。For a specific example, see the Example section. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用組態檔來啟用 HTML 說明頁功能，並將 SOAP 錯誤內部的例外狀況資訊傳回至用戶端，以供偵錯之用 (除了啟用中繼資料支援)。The following code example shows how to use a configuration file to enable the HTML help page feature and return exception information inside a SOAP fault back to the client for debugging purposes (in addition to enabling metadata support). [!code-xml[ServiceDebugBehaviorConfig#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/servicedebugbehaviorconfig/cs/hostapplication.exe.config#1)]

span.span: <serviceDebug>

public: property System::String ^ HttpHelpPageBinding { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.HttpHelpPageBinding : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定字串值，這個值會指定當使用 HTTP 來存取服務說明頁面時，所要使用的繫結。

span.span: Gets or sets a string value that specifies the binding to be used when HTTP is utilized to access the service help page.

value.span: 當利用 HTTP 來存取服務說明頁面時所要使用的繫結。

span.span: The binding to be used when HTTP is utilized to access the service help page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果沒有設定這個屬性，就會適時使用預設的繫結 (HttpTransportBindingElement) 來存取服務說明頁面。If this property is not set, the default binding (HttpTransportBindingElement) is used for service help page access as appropriate.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ HttpHelpPageBindingConfiguration { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.HttpHelpPageBindingConfiguration : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定字串，這個字串會指向定義 中所指定繫結的額外組態資訊之 XML 區段。

span.span: Gets or sets a string that points to an XML section defining additional configuration information for the binding specified in .

value.span: 定義 中所指定繫結之其他組態資訊的 XML 區段。

span.span: An XML section defining additional configuration information for the binding specified in .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool HttpHelpPageEnabled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.HttpHelpPageEnabled : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 是否在 屬性指定的位址發佈 HTML 說明頁。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) publishes an HTML help page at the address specified by the property.

value.span: 如果 WCF 發行 HTML 說明頁，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if WCF publishes an HTML help page; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以將這個屬性設定為 `false`，以停用 HTML 瀏覽器可見的 HTML 說明頁的發行。You can set this property to `false` to disable the publication of an HTML help page visible to HTML browsers. 如果要確保 HTML 說明頁是在由 屬性控制的位置發行，必須將這個屬性設定為 `true`。To ensure the HTML help page is published at the location controlled by the property, you must set this property to `true`. 此外，還必須符合下列其中一項條件：In addition, one of the following conditions must also be met: - 屬性是支援 HTTP 通訊協定配置的絕對位址。The property is an absolute address that supports the HTTP protocol scheme. - 有支援 HTTP 通訊協定配置的服務的基底位址。There is a base address for the service that supports the HTTP protocol scheme. 如果將不支援 HTTP 通訊協定配置的絕對位址指派至 屬性，將會擲回例外狀況，但是其他任何不符合前述條件的情況都會造成沒有例外狀況和沒有 HTML 說明頁。Although an exception is thrown if an absolute address that does not support the HTTP protocol scheme is assigned to the property, any other scenario in which neither of the preceding criteria is met results in no exception and no HTML help page.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Uri ^ HttpHelpPageUrl { Uri ^ get(); void set(Uri ^ value); };
member this.HttpHelpPageUrl : Uri with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定 HTML 說明檔的發行位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the location at which the HTML help file is published.

value.span: 當使用 HTML 瀏覽器檢視端點時，使用者所看到的自訂 HTML 說明檔的相對或絕對 HTTP URL。

span.span: The relative or absolute HTTP-based URL of the custom HTML help file the user sees when the endpoint is viewed using an HTML browser.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個屬性來啟用從 HTTP/Get 要求 (例如，從 HTML 瀏覽器) 傳回的自訂 HTML 說明檔。You can use this property to enable the use of a custom HTML help file that is returned from an HTTP/Get request, for example, from an HTML browser. HTML 說明檔的位置解析如下。The location of the HTML help file is resolved as follows. 1. 如果這個屬性的值是相對位址，HTML 說明檔的位置就是支援 HTTP 要求的服務基底位址的值，加上這個屬性值。If the value of this property is a relative address, the location of the HTML help file is the value of the service base address that supports HTTP requests, plus this property value. 2. 如果這個屬性的值是絕對位址且支援 HTTP 要求，HTML 說明檔的位置就是這個屬性的值。If the value of this property is an absolute address and supports HTTP requests, the location of the HTML help file is the value of this property. 3. 如果這個屬性的值是絕對位址，但不支援 HTTP 要求，便會擲回例外狀況。If the value of this property is absolute but does not support HTTP requests, an exception is thrown. 這個屬性只有在 屬性為 `true` 時才有效。This property is valid only when the property is `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ HttpsHelpPageBinding { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.HttpsHelpPageBinding : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定字串值，這個值會指定當使用 HTTPS 來存取服務說明頁面時，所要使用的繫結。

span.span: Gets or sets a string value that specifies the binding to be used when HTTPS is utilized to access the service help page.

value.span: 當利用 HTTPS 來存取服務說明頁面時所要使用的繫結。

span.span: The binding to be used when HTTPS is utilized to access the service help page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果沒有設定這個屬性，就會適時使用預設的繫結 (HttpsTransportBindingElement) 來存取服務說明頁面。If this property is not set, the default binding (HttpsTransportBindingElement) is used for service help page access as appropriate.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ HttpsHelpPageBindingConfiguration { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定字串，這個字串會指向定義 中所指定繫結的額外組態資訊之 XML 區段。

span.span: Gets or sets a string that points to an XML section defining additional configuration information for the binding specified in .

value.span: 定義 中所指定繫結之其他組態資訊的 XML 區段。

span.span: An XML section defining additional configuration information for the binding specified in .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool HttpsHelpPageEnabled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.HttpsHelpPageEnabled : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指定 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 是否會在由 屬性所指定的位址，透過 HTTPS 傳回 HTML 說明檔。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) returns an HTML help file over HTTPS at the address specified by the property.

value.span: 如果 HTML 說明檔傳回至提出 HTTPS/GET 要求的用戶端 (例如，從 HTML 瀏覽器)，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if an HTML help file is returned to clients making an HTTPS/GET request, for example, from an HTML browser; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以將這個屬性設定為 `false`，以停用 HTML 瀏覽器可見的 HTML 說明頁的發行。You can set this property to `false` to disable the publication of an HTML help page visible to HTML browsers. 如果要確保 HTML 說明頁是在由 屬性控制的位置發行，必須將這個屬性設定為 `true`。To ensure the HTML help page is published at the location controlled by the property, you must set this property to `true`. 此外，還必須符合下列其中一項條件：In addition, one of the following conditions must also be met: - 屬性是支援 HTTPS 通訊協定配置的絕對位址。The property is an absolute address that supports the HTTPS protocol scheme. - 有支援 HTTPS 通訊協定配置的服務的基底位址。There is a base address for the service that supports the HTTPS protocol scheme. - 如果將不支援 HTTPS 通訊協定配置的絕對位址指派至 屬性，將會擲回例外狀況，但是其他任何不符合前述條件的情況都會造成沒有例外狀況和沒有 HTML 說明頁。Although an exception is thrown if an absolute address that does not support the HTTPS protocol scheme is assigned to the property, any other scenario in which neither of the preceding criteria is met results in no exception and no HTML help page.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Uri ^ HttpsHelpPageUrl { Uri ^ get(); void set(Uri ^ value); };
member this.HttpsHelpPageUrl : Uri with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定發行 HTML 說明檔以使用 HTTPS 進行擷取的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the location at which an HTML help file is published for retrieval using HTTPS.

value.span: 當使用 HTML 瀏覽器檢視端點時，使用者所看到的自訂 HTML 說明檔的相對或絕對 HTTPS URL。

span.span: The relative or absolute HTTPS-based URL of the custom HTML help file the user sees when the endpoint is viewed using an HTML browser.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個屬性來啟用從 HTTPS/Get 要求 (例如，從 HTML 瀏覽器) 傳回的自訂 HTML 說明檔。You can use this property to enable the use of a custom HTML help file that is returned from an HTTPS/Get request, for example, from an HTML browser. HTML 說明檔的位置解析如下。The location of the HTML help file is resolved as follows. 1. 如果這個屬性的值是相對位址，HTML 說明檔的位置就是支援 HTTPS 要求的服務基底位址的值，加上這個屬性值。If the value of this property is a relative address, the location of the HTML help file is the value of the service base address that supports HTTPS requests, plus this property value. 2. 如果這個屬性的值是絕對位址且支援 HTTPS 要求，HTML 說明檔的位置就是這個屬性的值。If the value of this property is an absolute address and supports HTTPS requests, the location of the HTML help file is the value of this property. 3. 如果這個屬性的值是絕對位址，但不支援 HTTPS 要求，便會擲回例外狀況。If the value of this property is absolute but does not support HTTPS requests, an exception is thrown. 這個屬性只有在 屬性為 `true` 時才有效。This property is valid only when the property is `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指定是否要在傳回至用戶端以進行偵錯的 SOAP 錯誤詳細資料中包含 Managed 例外狀況資訊。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether to include managed exception information in the detail of SOAP faults returned to the client for debugging purposes.

value.span: 如果 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 要在 SOAP 錯誤中傳回 Managed 例外狀況資訊，以供用戶端偵錯之用，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) returns managed exception information in the SOAP faults for client-side debugging purposes; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您將 屬性以程式設計的方式設定為 `true`，就可以讓 Managed 例外狀況資訊傳送至用戶端以便偵錯，以及發行 HTML 資訊檔案，在 Web 瀏覽器中瀏覽該服務的使用者便可以存取這些檔案。If you set the property to `true` programmatically, you can enable the flow of managed exception information to the client for debugging purposes, as well as the publication of HTML information files for users browsing the service in Web browsers. > [!CAUTION] > 將 Managed 例外狀況資訊傳回至服務可能會有安全性風險。Returning managed exception information to services can be a security risk. 這是因為例外狀況細節會公開內部用戶端實作的相關資訊，可能會被未經授權的服務加以利用。This is because exception details expose information about the internal client implementation that could be used by unauthorized services.
